name: Unveiling (itch)
description:
Minesweeper variant where you have to flag every knowable safe tile before continuing in order to make the biggest reveal. Notably, this includes certain tiles you wouldn't be able to know about through basic minesweeper logic.

Made for the Thinky Puzzle Game Jam 2.

Controls:

  • Left click to interact with menus
  • Left click on the bell or space to attempt to confirm a step
  • Left click or X while hovering over a tile to flag it as safe
  • Middle click or C while hovering over a tile to flag it as unresolved but still important
  • Right click or V while hovering over a tile to flag it as unsafe
  • Esc to exit a level or menu
